contentfulBlogPost.title: A new home for my thoughts

childMarkdownRemark.html:
I've been journalling a lot recently and wanted to transfer that process of active reflection into a semi-public domain.

So here it is: my blog. It's a little empty right now, but it will grow soon enough.
